text.integrationforegoing.book.addon_int: Seems like you've installed Integration Foregoing...@L@@L@Integration Foregoing is the official addon for Industrial Foregoing, making use of its API and added some missing mod integrations.@L@@L@Added contents includes: Additional straw drinking handler for fluids from other mods, Bioreactor entries, Plant Gatherer handlers, Tinkers' Construct tool materials and more!
